StoredProcedureOraclev10g.name: REINDEX_SINGLE
StoredProcedureOraclev10g.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE UIM_DI01.REINDEX_SINGLE(class_id integer)
IS
CURSOR c1 IS SELECT child cid
FROM cs_class_hierarchy
START WITH father = class_id
CONNECT BY PRIOR child = father

UNION ALL

SELECT class_id cid FROM DUAL;
CURSOR c2 IS SELECT c.cid FROM (
SELECT child cid
FROM cs_class_hierarchy
START WITH father = class_id
CONNECT BY PRIOR child = father

UNION ALL

SELECT class_id cid FROM DUAL
) c
JOIN cs_class ON id = c.cid WHERE indexed = '1' AND rownum <= 100;
BEGIN
FOR r IN c1 LOOP
reindexpure_class(abs(r.cid));
END LOOP;

FOR r IN c2 LOOP
reindexderivedobjects(abs(r.cid));
END LOOP;
END;
StoredProcedureOraclev10g.body:
CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE UIM_DI01.REINDEX_SINGLE(class_id integer)
IS
CURSOR c1 IS SELECT child cid
FROM cs_class_hierarchy
START WITH father = class_id
CONNECT BY PRIOR child = father

UNION ALL

SELECT class_id cid FROM DUAL;
CURSOR c2 IS SELECT c.cid FROM (
SELECT child cid
FROM cs_class_hierarchy
START WITH father = class_id
CONNECT BY PRIOR child = father

UNION ALL

SELECT class_id cid FROM DUAL
) c
JOIN cs_class ON id = c.cid WHERE indexed = '1' AND rownum <= 100;
BEGIN
FOR r IN c1 LOOP
reindexpure_class(abs(r.cid));
END LOOP;

FOR r IN c2 LOOP
reindexderivedobjects(abs(r.cid));
END LOOP;
END;
